name: Highway Chase
description:
Dodge the rather slow drivers and don't run out of gas!

Credits:

  • 'Manaspace Font' by codeman38 (www.1001fonts.com)
  • 'Racing-Menu' Music by Eric Matyas (www.soundimage.org)

Source code is written for Pygame 1.9.6 and Python 3.7.6
